data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.expected_result: The second invite has a highlight like the first one
data.short_description: Invite links lose its blue highlight when it's in a sentence (Note: The background highlight like mentions when they are yellow, and not the color of the link. Check attached for better explanation.)
data.steps_to_repro: - Send an invite link with nothing else (optional) - Send an invite link with some letters or words after or before it - Compare the highlight between Step 1 and 2
